flawed_nl_solution:
Allie has 9 - 1 = <<9-1=5>>5 toys of the same value.
Without the value of the one $12 toy, all 5 other toys are worth in total 52 - 12 = $<<52-12=40>>40.
That would mean, that one of the other toys is worth 40 / 5 = $<<40/5=8>>8.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
